attributes.action: Return A&E and Life Saving Treatment to Burnley General Hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you call an amubulance for an emergency, instead of being taken to Burnley General Hospital's A&E department, you will now be driven to Royal Blackburn Hospital which is some distance away.  Burnley's A&E department covered a huge area and population.  Even for someone like myself living near the motorway in Burnley, the journey takes 20 - 30 minutes at QUIET PERIODS to travel to Blackburn hospital.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Return A&E and Life Saving Treatment to Burnley General Hospital."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16959


Prime Minister's Office
